quotes.message: Creating something is all about problem-solving.
quotes.name: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.message: I've learned over decades of building that a deadline is a potent tool for problem-solving.
quotes.name: Adam Savage

quotes.message: Too many problem-solving sessions become battlegrounds where decisions are made based on power rather than intelligence.
quotes.name: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.message: Problem solving is hunting. It is savage pleasure and we are born to it.
quotes.name: Thomas Harris

quotes.message: Never bring the problem solving stage into the decision making stage. Otherwise, you surrender yourself to the problem rather than the solution.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: I'm not afraid of problem-solving. There is always a way.
quotes.name: Hanneli Mustaparta

quotes.message: We can not solve our problems with the same level of thinking that created them.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: I suppose it is tempting, if the only tool you have is a hammer, to treat everything as if it were a nail.
quotes.name: Abraham Maslow

quotes.message: Never try to solve all the problems at once make them line up for you one-by-one.
quotes.name: Richard Sloma

quotes.message: One thing is sure. We have to do something. We have to do the best we know how at the moment . . . ; If it doesn't turn out right, we can modify it as we go along.
quotes.name: Franklin D.Roosevelt

quotes.message: Erroneous assumptions can be disastrous.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker

quotes.message: Determine the thing that can and shall be done, and then we shall find the way.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: It is a mistake to think you can solve any major problems just with potatoes.
quotes.name: Douglas Adams

quotes.message: There's no use talking about the problem unless you talk about the solution.
quotes.name: Betty Williams

quotes.message: The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the world's problems.
quotes.name: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.message: The direct use of force is such a poor solution to any problem, it is generally employed only by small children and large nations.
quotes.name: David Friedman

quotes.message: As much as we may want to withdraw into a world of pure problem solving, we have to acknowledge that the most successful architectures are the ones you can actually convince someone to implement.
quotes.name: Jesse James Garrett

quotes.message: We experience problem-solving sessions as war zones, we view competing ideas as enemies, and we use problems as weapons to blame and defeat opposition forces.
quotes.name: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.message: Solving big problems is easier than solving little problems.
quotes.name: Sergey Brin

quotes.message: I think the next best thing to solving a problem is finding some humor in it.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: When solving problems, dig at the roots instead of just hacking at the leaves.
quotes.name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.message: Solving a problem created by debt... by creating more debt is a fool's errand.
quotes.name: Olivier Sarkozy

quotes.message: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Don't find fault, find a remedy.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems--not people; to focus your energies on answers--not excuses.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: Make small commitments and keep them. Be a light, not a judge. Be a model, not a critic. Be part of the solution, not part of the problem.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: There are two ways of meeting difficulties: You alter the difficulties or you alter yourself to meet them.
quotes.name: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.message: To solve any problem, here are three questions to ask yourself: First, what could I do? Second, what could I read? And third, who could I ask?
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Whatever your problem, no matter how difficult, you can release spiritual power sufficient to solve your problem. The secret is--pray and believe.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: As the world we live in is so unpredictable, the ability to learn and to adapt to change is imperative, alongside creativity, problem-solving, and communication skills.
quotes.name: Alain Dehaze

quotes.message: If I had an hour to solve a problem I'd spend 55 minutes thinking about the problem and 5 minutes thinking about solutions.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The formulation of the problem is often more essential than its solution, which may be merely a matter of mathematical or experimental skill.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Intellectuals solve problems; geniuses prevent them.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Until we have real conflict, we don’t fully understand the problem.
quotes.name: Alfred Sloan

quotes.message: Identify your problems but give your power and energy to solutions.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: We always hope for the easy fix: the one simple change that will erase a problem in a stroke. But few things in life work this way. Instead, success requires making a hundred small steps go right - one after the other, no slipups, no goofs, everyone pitching in.
quotes.name: Atul Gawande

quotes.message: Avoiding a problem doesn't solve it.
quotes.name: Bonnie Jean Thornley

quotes.message: Difficulties are opportunities to better things; they are stepping-stones to greater experience.... When one door closes, another always opens; as a natural law it has to, to balance.
quotes.name: Brian Adams

quotes.message: Again and again, the impossible decision is solved when we see that the problem is only a tough decision waiting to be made.
quotes.name: Dr. Robert Schuller

quotes.message: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
quotes.name: Duke Ellington

quotes.message: Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: It is better to solve one problem five different ways, than to solve five problems one way.
quotes.name: George Pólya

quotes.message: It is not stress that kills us. It is effective adaptation to stress that allows us to live.
quotes.name: George Vaillant

quotes.message: For every complex problem there is an answer that is clear, simple, and wrong.
quotes.name: HL Mencken

quotes.message: No problem can be solved until it is reduced to some simple form. The changing of a vague difficulty into a specific, concrete form is a very essential element in thinking.
quotes.name: J. P. Morgan

quotes.message: The opposite of a problem would likely be the correct solution.
quotes.name: Joey Lawsin

quotes.message: A problem well stated is a problem half solved.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Think outside the square. Think for yourself don't just follow the herd. Think multidisciplinary! Problems by definition, cross many academic disciplines.
quotes.name: Lucas Remmerswaal

quotes.message: You can increase your problem-solving skills by honing your question-asking ability.
quotes.name: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.message: The most serious mistakes are not being made as a result of wrong answers. The truly dangerous thing is asking the wrong questions.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker Men

quotes.message: Vocabulary words are the building blocks of the internal learning structure. Vocabulary is also the tool to better define a problem, seek more accurate solutions, etc.
quotes.name: Ruby K. Payne

quotes.message: If you define the problem correctly, you almost have the solution.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
quotes.name: Theodore Rubin

quotes.message: Whatever the problem, be part of the solution. Don’t just sit around raising questions and pointing out obstacles.
quotes.name: Tina Fey

quotes.message: Identify your problems but give your power and energy to solutions.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Every problem has a solution. You just have to be creative enough to find it.
quotes.name: Travis Kalanick
